title: Oceania 5v5 Preseason Tournament - Sign ups open!
body:
#**Dear Summoners,**

I will be hosting a **free** 5v5 tournament for everyone to enjoy in celebration of the preseason!

#Introduction 
**1. When is the tournament?**
20th of November @ 6pm. Check-ins start at 1 hour prior to starting (5pm).
Sign ups are open NOW!

**2. Who are we playing?**
Players will be VSing other teams that have signed up to the event. 
After sign-ups close, players will then be properly seeded to ensure a fair fight.

**3. How do I contact the admin?**
You may contact me in-game @ bollockz OR add me on skype @ helloyesiamson
I work overnights and rarely sleep, so I am available most of the day.

**4. What are the rules?**
The rules are simple. Being my first event I would like to keep it that way. In saying that, this seems much easier than I thought.
The tournament format will be Single Elimination. Players will fight on the Summoner's Rift with a team of 5. Players who do not check-in will be disqualified and the default winning team will advance through their bracket. 

The tournament will consist of a maximum of 16 teams. **The first 16 teams** to apply will be eligible for the tournament. 

**5. How do I sign up?**
Sign ups are open until the 19th of November at 12pm.
To sign-up successfully you must register on the LoL event page http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/155169#info and,
signup (do not have to register) to challonge http://challonge.com/tournaments/signup/maXUdCBSZZ

**6. What are the prizes?**
Each player on each team will receive the following for their placements.
**1st Place:** Triumphant Ryze + 4 Win IP Boost
**2nd Place:** 4 Win IP Boost
**3rd Place:** 4 Win IP Boost
**4th Place: **4 Win IP Boost
**5th Place:** 4 Win IP Boost
**6th Place:** 4 Win IP Boost
**7th Place:** 4 Win IP Boost
**8th Place:** 4 Win IP Boost

**!IMPORTANT!**
**Prize distribution:**
To be eligible for prizing **YOU MUST:**
	- Signup on the EVENT page http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/155169#info
	- Signup (do not have to register) on Challonge http://challonge.com/tournaments/signup/maXUdCBSZZ
If you fail to do so, you will unfortunately NOT be eligible for prizing. So please, please do these 2 things.
After winners are announced, prizes will take a few days to be distributed by Riot.

#**Tournament Schedule**
If you have created a team, and WANT to be on time, please follow this schedule:
20th of November, 2015
**Time----------------------------Event**
05:00PM AEST------=      Check in
06:00PM AEST------=	Check in closes / seeding begins
06:05PM AEST------=	Tournament brackets released
06:10PM AEST------=	Round of eight begins
07:30PM AEST------=	Quarter finals begin
08:50PM AEST------=	Semi finals begin
10:10PM AEST------=	Grand finals begin
11:40PM AEST------=	Winner announced

#Thank you & Good luck!
Thanks to everyone for participating and for helping make this possible. Let's hope to see more events in the near future!

Cheers,

_bollockz_

replies.body: awesome man, hope lots of people see and sign up.
Thanks!
This is great, best of luck with the tournament!
Do ranks matter?

Hi Edday,

Great question! The answer is no. Ranks do not matter, I want to include as many people as I can.

Cheers
Thanks for the answer! Cheers.
Link doesn't work.
It's TBA, links are not up yet

Correct bombolz if you are referring to official event link. It is currently being processed. 

If you are referring to challonge let me know please!

Edit: Found an error where adding the bracket after the link caused chrome to assume it was apart of the link.
http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/155169#info link is now up!
this is honestly going to be fun!
Hey bollockz can we have subs?

Yes you can have subs.

Please PM me in-game your Team name and the 5 members!
Edit: And your subs, heh.

Hello,

It is necessary for every single member of the team to register? im on one of the teams and says that the registration is closed.

All members must register @ http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/155169#info to be eligible for prizing.
Currently it is closed, I will try and get them open until the end of the tournament to allow for everyone to be eligible.
Not much I can do here.
can u still do this if u have two people in ur team or do u need to have 5 people.

Thanks for your question. This will help me provide more information for the next event :^)

A team MUST consist of 5 players to participate.
how do we get into match with other players on match day
I'll provide you with that, each Team captain will message me on the night.
how do u know who is team captain
Hey man, my teams already entered but just have a question on the check in time/starting time.  On this post it says 5pm but on the challonge it says 1:30-2
Can i participate at my house or do i need to go to a venue to participate?
Tournament is online!
Sign-ups available at http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/155169#info now!
Is it full? I looked on challenge and it looked like it was all worked out
There are still 7 spots available
